mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_chat (sender_id, receiver_id, message) VALUES (#{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT chat.sender_id AS sender_id, chat.receiver_id AS receiver_id, users.username AS username, pi.first_name AS first_name, pi.middle_name AS middle_name, pi.last_name AS last_name, chat.message AS message, chat.created_at AS created_at FROM tbl_user_mst AS users INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info_mst AS pi ON users.user_id = pi.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_chat AS chat ON users.user_id = chat.sender_id WHERE (chat.sender_id = #{sender_id} AND chat.receiver_id = #{receiver_id}) OR (chat.sender_id = #{receiver_id} AND chat.receiver_id = #{sender_id}) AND chat.del_flag = 0;
